item.title: I-10 West - Exits 34 and 32
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 34 - Loop 375/Joe Battle Blvd./Americas Ave. Exit 34 is currently closed due to construction.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 34
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 34 - FM-659/Zaragoza road/George Dieter Drive. The FM-659 shield is incorrectly signed as TX-659. Zaragoza Road connects I-10 to the Zaragoza International Bridge into Mexico.
